main event: Multiple military personnel observed unidentified objects at Continental Divide AFS, New Mexico on 11 December 1957.
interesting points: Witnesses described the objects as oblong and the size of a pencil eraser,The objects were colored like cigarette ash,The objects flew at a speed less than 1000 mph and appeared to reverse course before leveling out,A gemoid meteor shower was mentioned as a prominent event that year,The sighting lasted approximately 3-8 seconds and involved multiple witnesses describing a large number of similar sightings.
sighted object: unidentified oblong objects in the sky
location: Continental Divide AFS, New Mexico, USA
witness description: military personnel assigned to 759th ACW Squadron
